name: dropbox-000-deny-lan-scanning
description: Block Dropbox LAN Sync and network discovery. Dropbox attempts to find other Dropbox instances on the local network via broadcast/multicast on RFC1918 private ranges. This is a security risk: LAN Sync exposes file metadata and could leak data to unauthorized devices on shared networks. Disable LAN Sync in Dropbox preferences as well. Covers 10.x.x.x, 172.16-31.x.x, 192.168.x.x private ranges and broadcast address 255.255.255.255.
